column.name: description
column.value: Whether the system should send out mails, or just log their generation

column.name: description
column.value: The externally visible url of the application

column.name: description
column.value: The email address to blind carbon copy on every message

column.name: description
column.value: The Number of days prior to expiration to send out a Task Reminder

column.name: description
column.value: Not Confidential. Records may be viewed by all users.

column.name: body
column.value:
Early Alert Details: Faculty Member: $FacultyMember Faculty Office Location: $FacultyOfficeLocation Faculty Phone Number: #FacultyPhoneNumber Course: $CourseName Title: $CourseTitle Referral Reasons: $ReferralReasons
Faculty Suggestions:
$FacultySuggestions
Faculty Comments: $FacultyComments

column.name: description
column.value: Message sent from system to advisor when faculty member sends an alert.

column.name: body
column.value:
STUDENT $TermForEarlyAlert SYSTEM MESSAGE
Student Name: $FirstName $LastName Student ID: $SchoolId Student Phone: $HomePhone Student Email: $PrimaryEmailAddress Address: $AddressLine1 $AddressLine2 $City, $State, $ZipCode In the class: $ourseName Instructor: $CreatedByFirstName $CreatedByLastName Campus: $CampusName Instructor Office Location: $CreatedByOfficeLocation Instructor Email: $CreatedByPrimaryEmailAddress Instructor Phone: $CreatedByWorkPhone Advisor: $CoachFirstName $CoachLastName
Student has been identified by his/her instructor for the following reason:
$Reasons
The faculty suggestions are:
$Suggestions
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
$Comment
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
To access additional information or respond to this alert, Log-in to the SSP System and view the student's $TermForEarlyAlert Tool. $LinkToSSP
Email generated by Student Success Plan $TermForEarlyAlert

column.name: description
column.value: Message sent from system to student when faculty member sends an early alert.

column.name: body
column.value:
Dear $FirstName $LastName:
Your instructor for $CourseName notified me that you are experiencing issues that might affect your success at $InstitutionName. An academic advisor, counselor or coach will contact you soon to discuss your situation. In the meantime, here are a few resources which may help you find academic success.
Instructor: $CreatedByFirstName $CreatedByLastName Phone: $CreatedByWorkPhone Email: $CreatedByPrimaryEmailAddress
We value you as a student at $InstitutionName and want to support your success. If you have not been contacted by someone within a week, please feel free to speak with me.
Sincerely,
$CoachFirstName $CoachLastName $CoachTitle $CoachOfficeLocation $CoachWorkPhone $CoachPrimaryEmailAddress
Email generated by $InstitutionName Student Success Plan $TermForEarlyAlert
This is a system generated email. Please do not reply to this confirmation.

column.name: description
column.value: Message sent from system to faculty member when faculty member sends an alert.

column.name: body
column.value:
STUDENT $TermForEarlyAlert SYSTEM MESSAGE
Student Name: $FirstName $LastName Student ID: $SchoolId Student Phone: $HomePhone Student Email: $PrimaryEmailAddress Address: $AddressLine1 $AddressLine2 $City $State $ZipCode In the class: $CourseName Instructor: $CreatedByFirstName $CreatedByLastName Campus: $CampusName Instructor Office Location: $CreatedByOfficeLocation Instructor Email: $CreatedByPrimaryEmailAddress Instructor Phone: $CreatedByWorkPhone Advisor: $CoachFirstName $CoachLastName
Student has been identified by his/her instructor for the following reason:
$Reasons
The faculty suggestions are:
$Suggestions
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
$Comment
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************

column.name: name
column.value: Early Alert Response to Faculty from Coach

column.name: description
column.value: Message sent to faculty member (creator of the alert) when the Advisor responds via SSP.

column.name: body
column.value:
STUDENT $TermForEarlyAlert SYSTEM MESSAGE
This email is in response to an early alert notice initiated on $CreatedDate for the following student:
Student Name: $FirstName $LastName Student ID: $SchoolId In the class: $CourseName Instructor: $CreatedByFirstName $CreatedByLastName Advisor(s): $CoachFirstName $CoachLastName
This incident was addressed and CLOSED on $ClosedDate. The final outcome for this incident was:
$Outcomes
The student has been referred by his/her counselor to the following departments or services based upon early alert status:
$Referrals
******************* COUNSELOR COMMENTS *******************
$Comment
******************* COUNSELOR COMMENTS *******************
Email generated by $InstitutionName Student Success Plan $TermForEarlyAlert

changeSet.id: fix line breaks in EA message templates
changeSet.author: jon.adams

update.column:
STUDENT $TermForEarlyAlert SYSTEM MESSAGE
Student Name: $FirstName $LastName Student ID: $SchoolId Student Phone: $HomePhone Student Email: $PrimaryEmailAddress Address: $AddressLine1 $AddressLine2 $City, $State, $ZipCode In the class: $ourseName Instructor: $CreatedByFirstName $CreatedByLastName Campus: $CampusName Instructor Office Location: $CreatedByOfficeLocation Instructor Email: $CreatedByPrimaryEmailAddress Instructor Phone: $CreatedByWorkPhone Advisor: $CoachFirstName $CoachLastName
Student has been identified by his/her instructor for the following reason:
$Reasons
The faculty suggestions are:
$Suggestions
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
$Comment
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
To access additional information or respond to this alert, Log-in to the SSP System and view the student's $TermForEarlyAlert Tool. $LinkToSSP
Email generated by Student Success Plan $TermForEarlyAlert

Dear $FirstName $LastName:
Your instructor for $CourseName notified me that you are experiencing issues that might affect your success at $InstitutionName. An academic advisor, counselor or coach will contact you soon to discuss your situation. In the meantime, here are a few resources which may help you find academic success.
Instructor: $CreatedByFirstName $CreatedByLastName Phone: $CreatedByWorkPhone Email: $CreatedByPrimaryEmailAddress
We value you as a student at $InstitutionName and want to support your success. If you have not been contacted by someone within a week, please feel free to speak with me.
Sincerely,
$CoachFirstName $CoachLastName $CoachTitle $CoachOfficeLocation $CoachWorkPhone $CoachPrimaryEmailAddress
Email generated by $InstitutionName Student Success Plan $TermForEarlyAlert
This is a system generated email. Please do not reply to this confirmation.

STUDENT $TermForEarlyAlert SYSTEM MESSAGE
Student Name: $FirstName $LastName Student ID: $SchoolId Student Phone: $HomePhone Student Email: $PrimaryEmailAddress Address: $AddressLine1 $AddressLine2 $City $State $ZipCode In the class: $CourseName Instructor: $CreatedByFirstName $CreatedByLastName Campus: $CampusName Instructor Office Location: $CreatedByOfficeLocation Instructor Email: $CreatedByPrimaryEmailAddress Instructor Phone: $CreatedByWorkPhone Advisor: $CoachFirstName $CoachLastName
Student has been identified by his/her instructor for the following reason:
$Reasons
The faculty suggestions are:
$Suggestions
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
$Comment
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************

STUDENT $TermForEarlyAlert SYSTEM MESSAGE
This email is in response to an early alert notice initiated on $CreatedDate for the following student:
Student Name: $FirstName $LastName Student ID: $SchoolId In the class: $CourseName Instructor: $CreatedByFirstName $CreatedByLastName Advisor(s): $CoachFirstName $CoachLastName
This incident was addressed and CLOSED on $ClosedDate. The final outcome for this incident was:
$Outcomes
The student has been referred by his/her counselor to the following departments or services based upon early alert status:
$Referrals
******************* COUNSELOR COMMENTS *******************
$Comment
******************* COUNSELOR COMMENTS *******************
Email generated by $InstitutionName Student Success Plan $TermForEarlyAlert

Early Alert Details: Faculty Member: $FacultyMember Faculty Office Location: $FacultyOfficeLocation Faculty Phone Number: #FacultyPhoneNumber Course: $CourseName Title: $CourseTitle Referral Reasons: $ReferralReasons
Faculty Suggestions:
$FacultySuggestions
Faculty Comments: $FacultyComments

STUDENT $!termToRepresentEarlyAlert SYSTEM MESSAGE
Student Name: $earlyAlert.person.firstName $earlyAlert.person.lastName
Student ID: $!earlyAlert.person.schoolId
Student Phone: $!earlyAlert.person.homePhone
Student Email: $earlyAlert.person.primaryEmailAddress
Address: #if( $earlyAlert.person.addressLine1 )$earlyAlert.person.addressLine1, #end#if( $earlyAlert.person.addressLine2 )$earlyAlert.person.addressLine2, #end#if( $earlyAlert.person.city )$earlyAlert.person.city, #end#if( $earlyAlert.person.state )$earlyAlert.person.state, #end$!earlyAlert.person.zipCode
In the class: $!earlyAlert.courseName
Instructor: $earlyAlert.createdBy.firstName $earlyAlert.createdBy.lastName
Campus: $earlyAlert.campus.name
Instructor Office Location: $!earlyAlert.createdBy.officeLocation
Instructor Email: $earlyAlert.createdBy.primaryEmailAddress
Instructor Phone: $!earlyAlert.createdBy.workPhone
Advisor: $earlyAlert.person.coach.firstName $earlyAlert.person.coach.lastName
Student has been identified by his/her instructor for the following reason:
#foreach( $earlyAlertReason in $earlyAlert.earlyAlertReasonIds ) $earlyAlertReason.name
#end
The faculty suggestions are:
#foreach( $earlyAlertSuggestion in $earlyAlert.earlyAlertSuggestionIds ) $earlyAlertSuggestion.name
#end #if( $earlyAlert.comment ) ******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
$earlyAlert.comment
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS ******************* #end
To access additional information or respond to this alert, log-in#if( $applicationTitle ) to $applicationTitle#end#if( $termForEarlyAlert ) and view the student's $termForEarlyAlert Tool#end. $!linkToSSP
Email generated by $!applicationTitle $!termForEarlyAlert

Dear $earlyAlert.person.firstName $earlyAlert.person.lastName:
Your instructor for #if( $earlyAlert.courseName )$earlyAlert.courseName#else<COURSE NAME UNAVAILABLE>#end notified me that you are experiencing issues that might affect your success#if( $institutionName ) at $institutionName#end. An academic advisor, counselor or coach will contact you soon to discuss your situation. In the meantime, here are a few resources which may help you find academic success.
Instructor: $earlyAlert.createdBy.firstName $earlyAlert.createdBy.lastName#if( $earlyAlert.createdBy.workPhone )
Phone: $earlyAlert.createdBy.workPhone#end
Email: $earlyAlert.createdBy.primaryEmailAddress
The Tutoring and Learning Center (Library: 512-4506) provides professional tutoring in the subject areas of English grammar and writing, basic math and study skills. The Center also provides additional quiet computer areas for students, online resources, and supplemental learning materials. Walk-ins are available during open hours. Call for schedule.
Tutorial Services (Library: 512-2792) provides free educational assistance for students who are enrolled in most 100 level courses (including DEV and some 200 level classes). Student tutors provide individual tutoring sessions by appointment.
The Writing Center (Library: 512-5106) provides a comfortable learning environment for classroom instruction and tutorial assistance for writing.
The Math Lab (Building 1, Room 315: 512-2286) provides tutoring and homework help for students in MAT classes. Walk-ins are available during open hours.
COPE is a unique series of workshops designed to help students Conquer some of the Obstacles that can Prevent the achievement of their Educational goals. A schedule of topics is available in 10-424 or online at http://www.sinclair.edu/stservices/cnsl/Cope/ Contact Anthony Webb at 512-2752 for handouts of past or future workshops.
Information on Dropping: Before withdrawing from any or all classes, consult an academic advisor. If you are using financial aid to pay for your tuition or books, contact the Financial Aid & Scholarships Office: Building 10, 3rd Floor, (937) 512-3000.
We value you as a student #if( $institutionName ) at $institutionName#end and want to support your success. If you have not been contacted by someone within a week, please feel free to speak with me.
Sincerely,
$earlyAlert.person.coach.firstName $earlyAlert.person.coach.lastName
$earlyAlert.person.coach.title#if( $earlyAlert.person.coach.officeLocation )
$earlyAlert.person.coach.officeLocation#end#if( $earlyAlert.person.coach.workPhone )
$earlyAlert.person.coach.workPhone#end
$earlyAlert.person.coach.primaryEmailAddress
Email generated by $!institutionName $!applicationTitle $!termToRepresentEarlyAlert
This is a system generated email. Please do not reply to this confirmation.

STUDENT $!termToRepresentEarlyAlert SYSTEM MESSAGE
Student Name: $earlyAlert.person.firstName $earlyAlert.person.lastName
Student ID: $!earlyAlert.person.schoolId
Student Phone: $!earlyAlert.person.homePhone
Student Email: $earlyAlert.person.primaryEmailAddress
Address: #if( $earlyAlert.person.addressLine1 )$earlyAlert.person.addressLine1, #end#if( $earlyAlert.person.addressLine2 )$earlyAlert.person.addressLine2, #end#if( $earlyAlert.person.city )$earlyAlert.person.city, #end#if( $earlyAlert.person.state )$earlyAlert.person.state, #end$!earlyAlert.person.zipCode
In the class: $!earlyAlert.courseName
Instructor: $earlyAlert.createdBy.firstName $earlyAlert.createdBy.lastName
Campus: $!earlyAlert.campus.name
Instructor Office Location: $!earlyAlert.createdBy.officeLocation
Instructor Email: $earlyAlert.createdBy.primaryEmailAddress
Instructor Phone: $!earlyAlert.createdBy.workPhone
Advisor: $earlyAlert.person.coach.firstName $earlyAlert.person.coach.lastName
Student has been identified by his/her instructor for the following reason:
#foreach( $earlyAlertReason in $earlyAlert.earlyAlertReasonIds ) $earlyAlertReason.name
#end
The faculty suggestions are:
#foreach( $earlyAlertSuggestion in $earlyAlert.earlyAlertSuggestionIds ) $earlyAlertSuggestion.name
#end
#if( $earlyAlert.comment ) ******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
$earlyAlert.comment
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS ******************* #end
Email generated by $!institutionName $!applicationTitle $!termToRepresentEarlyAlert
This is a system generated email. Please do not reply to this confirmation.

STUDENT $!termToRepresentEarlyAlert SYSTEM MESSAGE
This email is in response to an early alert notice initiated on $earlyAlert.createdDate for the following student:
Student Name: $earlyAlert.person.firstName $earlyAlert.person.lastName
Student ID: $!earlyAlert.person.schoolId
In the class: $!earlyAlert.courseName
Instructor: $earlyAlert.createdBy.firstName $earlyAlert.createdBy.lastName
Advisor(s): $earlyAlert.person.coach.firstName $earlyAlert.person.coach.lastName
This incident was addressed and CLOSED on $earlyAlertResponse.closedDate. The final outcome for this incident was:
$!earlyAlertResponse.earlyAlertOutcome.name
#if( $earlyAlertResponse.earlyAlertOutcomeOtherDescription ) $earlyAlertResponse.earlyAlertOutcomeOtherDescription #end
The student has been referred by his/her counselor to the following departments or services based upon early alert status:
#foreach( $earlyAlertReferral in $earlyAlertResponse.earlyAlertReferralIds ) $earlyAlertReferral.name
#end
#if( $earlyAlertResponse.comment ) ******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
$earlyAlertResponse.comment
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS ******************* #end
Email generated by $!institutionName $!applicationTitle $!termToRepresentEarlyAlert

$!termToRepresentEarlyAlert DETAILS
Faculty Member: $earlyAlert.createdBy.fullName
Faculty Office Location: $!earlyAlert.createdBy.officeLocation
Faculty Phone Number: $!earlyAlert.createdBy.workPhone
Course: $!earlyAlert.courseName
Title: $!earlyAlert.courseTitle
Referral Reason:
#foreach( $earlyAlertReferral in $earlyAlertResponse.earlyAlertReferralIds ) $earlyAlertReferral.name
#end
Faculty suggestions:
#foreach( $earlyAlertSuggestion in $earlyAlert.earlyAlertSuggestionIds ) $earlyAlertSuggestion.name
#end
#if( $earlyAlert.comment ) ******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
$earlyAlert.comment
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS ******************* #end
Email generated by $!institutionName $!applicationTitle $!termToRepresentEarlyAlert
